title: Companion Approval Guide
content: er City - Society of Brilliance Lodge Agree to take Hoot's Hooch Requirement/s: Karlach + Jaheira - Hoots Hooligan Sharess' Caress, Wyrm's Crossing. Area between Wyrm's Fortresss and the Lower City Meeting Aradin in Sorcerous Sundries, Baldur's Gate. Tell him you found the Nightsong and say "She's immortal. And tough. You forget about turning her in for a reward" Requirement/s: Found the Nightsong Rolan is alive, survived Act 1 and 2 Astarion + Karlach + Jaheira + Rolan Sorcerous Sundries, Lower
